description: Responsible for analyzing AI-generated responses to coding problems and verifying their validity based on custom parameters including safety, usefulness, and correctness.

Collaborated with multiple teams of software developers and clients to develop community-level reports on topics ranging from diabetes to Medicaid usage for over eight hospital systems. Developed internal tools in VBA to automatically project customer database sizes, reducing projection-creation time by 20%. Worked on the internal sizing team to independently project hardware needs for more than 100 customers. Led the internal VMware pod, ensuring application-specific VM architecture requirements were met.
